message:
Dear Interviewer,

You have been requested to provide your availability for conducting interviews at {{ doc.company }}.

Interview Details:

  • Designation: {{ doc.for_designation }}
  • Job Opening: {{ doc.job_opening }}

Please log in to the system and submit your preferred time slots at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your support in helping us move forward with the recruitment process.

Best regards,
HR Team – {{ doc.company }}
name: Send to Interviewer for Availability
subject: Interview Availability Request – {{ doc.for_designation }} at {{ doc.company }}
